item.description:
I'm hosting a game night at my place on 9/8/12. It will start at 7:00 and it's BYOB. There will be an array of snacks but feel free to bring your own.

I have multiple tables so we could break up into 2 groups as I don't think I could accomodate a lot at 1 table.

If you want to, bring $1 to contribute towards our Meetup fees. It's much appreciated, but absolutely not required.

We'll can play whatever game everyone agrees on as long as someone owns it. I am not sure of just how many people I can accomodate as I have multiple tables but 8 seems good for now.

The attendee limit at each of these events will be determined by the maximum number of players the game can accommodate, so it will vary.

 

Any questions call me at 860 633-3424

Russell Solsky

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Game night @ Russell's
